achievements.title: The first step
achievements.desc: Watched 10 anime. Congratulations, you broke the magical number. Take a breath now, it will only get more difficult.

achievements.title: Casual watcher
achievements.desc: Watched 20 anime. You're used to seeing character's eyes bigger than their nose. If they have any nose.

achievements.title: A millionaire
achievements.desc: Watched 30 anime. You DID buy all of them, right?

achievements.title: Bragging rights
achievements.desc: Watched 40 anime. That's... a lot. You can be proud of yourself, that's for sure.

achievements.title: A lot of free time
achievements.desc: Watched 50 anime. Now pause, take a breath and stretch a bit. Remember not to sit too close to the screen.

achievements.title: Not Even My Final Form
achievements.desc: Watched 60 anime. Your power level is way above others'. The only way is up.

achievements.title: Gotta Watch Them All!
achievements.desc: Watched 70 anime. You should already know what that picture means.

achievements.title: The Collector
achievements.desc: Watched 80 animes. No, wait. The plural of anime is anime.

achievements.title: The Maniac
achievements.desc: Watched 90 anime. Is this healthy? You should contact your doctor.

achievements.title: The Legend
achievements.desc: Watched 100 anime. You're one of the chosen ones. You don't even have to brag, since everyone heard about you.

achievements.title: Database Breaker
achievements.desc: Watched 110 anime. Are you having fun, breaking all the rules? By the way, since when do we have that many anime in the database?!

achievements.title: This Is It
achievements.desc: Watched 120 anime. There is no higher level. You can stop now. Everyone, go home.
